text: The Jersey Shore cast surprised Deena Cortese for a pre - wedding and engagement party. Snooki, JWoww, Pauly D, Vinny Guadagnino and Sammi “ Sweetheart ” Giancola got together on Saturday night in Atlantic City for a surprise celebration for Cortese and her fiancé Christopher Buckner. Cortese shared the emotional moment her friends surprised her on Instagram. The clip shows Cortese walking into the restaurant and immediately bursting into tears when she sees the group. ` ` I love all these people so much what an amazing surprise we miss you mike @ mikethesituation,'' Cortese captioned the video. She also shared a series of photos on Instagram from the night, writing, ` ` My room
